name: Juergens Do It Center
materials: Cell Phones; Ni-Cd Batteries; Li-Ion Batteries; Ni-MH Batteries; Ni-Zn Batteries; Small Sealed Lead Acid Batteries; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Cameras; DVD Players/Blu-Ray Players/DVRs; Electronics; GPS Units; Laptop Computers; MP3 Players; Computer Peripherals; Portable Media Players; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Electronics; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; Video Game Systems; Blu-Ray Players; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: The U.S. EPA estimates that more than 350 million rechargeable batteries are purchased annually in the U.S. Thanks to the environmental commitment of this location, its easy and free to recycle your batteries. Bring your rechargeable batteries to this location and look for the recycling box or ask an associate how you can do your part for the environment.
